subject: College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Ed O’Bannon’s lawsuit over compensation for former athletes for the use of their likenesses is the latest action challenging the N.C.A.A.’s iron-fisted control over its athletes.
snippet: Ed O’Bannon’s lawsuit over compensation for former athletes for the use of their likenesses is the latest action challenging the N.C.A.A.’s iron-fisted control over its athletes.
